name: Dark Smile(Html5 Player & Search/Ranking)
description: A dark theme for niconico/nicovideo/ニコニコ/ニコ動画 html5 player(live not included), search/tag result and ranking pages. Player size automatically adapt to screen width and height on "large" & "auto", comment panel hide/show trigger by hover action; better fit for widescreen.
additional_info:
Ver0.95
fix for some new page changes.
